definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
to handle official business/to work (esp. in an office)
run by the local people/privately operated
to open/to start (a business etc)/to set up

sentences.english: Please fax this form to Beijing IHAC project office.
sentences.chinese: 請將此表傳真至北京藝匯家項目辦。

sentences.english: He wanted to get a license to drive a car.
sentences.chinese: 他想辦一張駕駛汽車的駕駛證。

sentences.english: I will have a gold card.
sentences.chinese: 我想辦一張貴行的牡丹信用卡。

sentences.english: Lizzy wants to join the school library.
sentences.chinese: 莉齊想辦這個學校圖書館的借書卡。

sentences.english: You can trust your relatives here with your affairs.
sentences.chinese: 你的事可以託你這兒的親戚辦。

sentences.english: By the way, tell your wife she throws a great party.
sentences.chinese: 還有，請告訴尊夫人她辦了一個很成功的派對。

sentences.english: Assuming it rains this morning- what shall we do?
sentences.chinese: 假設本日下午下雨的話我們奈何辦？

sentences.english: Editors of academic journal should become scholar-style editor and reach high spiritual confine.
sentences.chinese: 辦學術期刊對於辦刊人的精神境界要求很高。

sentences.english: They train technical cadres in short courses.
sentences.chinese: 他們辦短期培訓班培養技術幹部。

sentences.english: The market, meet the rabbit elder brother often do.
sentences.chinese: 趕集辦年貨，遇見兔大哥。

sentences.english: We"ve only sold our product at trade fairs, not in an on-going sales campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品只在商展時展售，而沒有辦促銷活動。

sentences.english: Let's do it in the way of business.
sentences.chinese: 這件事我們還是按做生意的老規矩辦吧。

sentences.english: The hospital managed by state - owned enterprise which was large - middle type was a products of planning economics.
sentences.chinese: 國有大中型企業辦醫院是計劃經濟的產物。

sentences.english: Why do you apply for American transit visa?
sentences.chinese: 你辦美國過境簽證的理由是什麼？

sentences.english: PDP reserves the right to the final explanation of above information.
sentences.chinese: 中美項目辦保留對以上信息的最終解釋權。

sentences.english: The wedding banquet, remove the drinks do costs 13208 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 此次辦婚宴，除去酒水共花費13208元。

definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
